metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6104 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
blog/rsslib.php in Moodle 2.2.x before 2.2.7, 2.3.x before 2.3.4, and 2.4.xbefore 2.4.1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information fromsite-level blogs by leveraging the guest role and reading an RSS feed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6104` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
